docs.snippet: Netherlands coach Louis van Gaal expects Costa Rica to play a similar brand of attacking football as Chile and Mexico used in their unsuccessful attempts to derail the Dutch World Cup campaign.
docs.lead_paragraph: Netherlands coach Louis van Gaal expects Costa Rica to play a similar brand of attacking football as Chile and Mexico used in their unsuccessful attempts to derail the Dutch World Cup campaign.

headline.main: Van Gaal: More of the Same From Costa Rica

docs.snippet: Hosts Brazil suffered a huge blow when they lost leading forward Neymar for the rest of the World Cup through injury on Friday as they set up an epic-looking semi-final against Europe's biggest remaining team Germany.

docs.snippet: Neymar's exit from the World Cup due to a back injury left Brazilians shocked and angered on Friday, darkening the mood after the hosts' 2-1 win over Colombia in the quarter-finals had sparked nationwide celebrations.
docs.lead_paragraph: Neymar's exit from the World Cup due to a back injury left Brazilians shocked and angered on Friday, darkening the mood after the hosts' 2-1 win over Colombia in the quarter-finals had sparked nationwide celebrations.

headline.main: Brazil Shocked, Angered by Neymar's World Cup Injury

docs.snippet: Costa Rica will play the Netherlands on Saturday, and a victory could bring a sense of solidarity to a region where the country’s team had been in the shadow of Mexico and the United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: Costa Rica will play the Netherlands on Saturday, and a victory could bring a sense of solidarity to a region where the country’s team had been in the shadow of Mexico and the United States.
docs.abstract: Author Andreas Campomar essay holds that underdog Costa Rica faces formidable Netherlands team in World Cup quarterfinals, but victory could bring a sense of solidarity to a region where the Costa Rican team has been in the shadow of Mexico and the United States.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Costa Rica Could Learn From Uruguay's Example

docs.snippet: Brazil and its marquee stadium, the Maracanã, is set to be the site of an unprecedented double after hosting this year's World Cup and the 2016 Summer Olympics.

docs.snippet: The Brazil-Colombia rivalry reached IndyCar, where Helio Castroneves contended with several Colombian drivers and his Colombian girlfriend during the quarterfinal.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Brazil-Colombia rivalry reached IndyCar, where Helio Castroneves contended with several Colombian drivers and his Colombian girlfriend during the quarterfinal.
docs.abstract: Brazil-Colombia soccer rivalry is all too familiar to IndyCar driver Helio Castroneves, Brazilian whose Team Penske teammate is Colombian Juan Pablo Montoya, and who lives with Colombian girlfriend Adriana Henao.
